headline.main: One Month Into the Afghan War

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: It was discouraging to see President Bush saying once again that ''you are with us, or you're with the terrorists'' (''U.S. Moves to Cut 2 Financial Links for Terror Group,'' front page, Nov. 8). The point seems to be that anyone who does not accept everything we say and do everything we ask becomes an enemy. This kind of rhetoric can only alienate the very people we need in order to be successful in the struggle against terrorism. DENIS F. SULLIVAN Locust Valley, N.Y., Nov. 8, 2001
abstract: Denis F Sullivan letter comments on November 8 article on US moves to cut financial links to terror groups
